en.today: Emotions and dreams expand as Luna moves through your sign, dear Aries, aligning with Mars, Chiron, and Jupiter throughout the morning. Work through any challenges that arise with compassion for yourself and others, but don't let your optimism or motivation waver. It's also important to recognize when you need a rest, giving yourself a chance to recharge instead of rushing progress. You'll feel more at ease with stillness once the moon enters Taurus this evening, and should cap off your day with an indulgent meal. Keep tabs on the time and avoid zoning out with screens past your bedtime while Pluto stirs tonight.

en.today: The Aries moon aligns with Mars, Chiron, and Jupiter this morning, dear Leo, encouraging you to push your own limits. Reservations around change or a fear of failure may have caused you to subconsciously self-restrict, unnecessarily holding up progress. Celebrate small milestones and adopt a mindfulness routine to support yourself on the road ahead. If you need further encouragement, ask the universe for signs. A stabilizing energy emerges once Luna enters Taurus this evening, helping you identify the most practical way forward. Loop loved ones into your agenda when Pluto stirs, but try not to balk against questions or well-meaning advice that follows.

en.today: Thorough contemplation is key for harnessing and understanding your own power, dearest Taurus. As the Aries moon aspects Mars, Chiron, and Jupiter, take control of your inner dialogue by addressing the facts and looking for opportunities. Confiding in a trusted ally can aid in problem-solving, but it's essential to guard your secrets against those who pass judgment or may not fully understand your perspective. You'll feel elevated and more confident once Luna enters your sign this evening, but you should prioritize personal needs before tackling major projects. It would be easy to wear yourself out when Pluto activates tonight.

en.today: Go where acceptance comes naturally, dear Gemini, as the Aries moon aligns with Mars, Chiron, and Jupiter. This cosmic climate highlights the importance of steadfast communities, making cliques and petty dynamics highly unappealing. The internet might serve as a poignant reminder of how toxic others can be, so try to engage with genuine friendships in the real world. Take a breather once evening sets in and Luna enters Taurus, encouraging you to lie low in silence before closing out the day. Connect with your ancestors or preferred spiritual practices to alleviate fears and find support that transcends the material realm.
